trans-unit.source: Provides event listening support for classes that expect to receive events through the WeakEvent pattern and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 为希望通过 WeakEvent 模式和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 接收事件的类提供事件侦听支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> (a dispatcher) forwards an event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A> method on classes that implement this interface, and that have been added as listeners by calling <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> methods beforehand.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> （调度程序） 将事件转发通过调用<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A>类来实现此接口，并且，通过调用添加为侦听器方法<xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>事先方法。

trans-unit.source: The principal reason for following the WeakEvent pattern is when the event source has an object lifetime that is potentially independent of the event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 事件源具有可能独立于事件侦听器对象生存期时遵循 WeakEvent 模式的主要原因。

trans-unit.source: Using the central event dispatching of a <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> enables the handlers for listeners to be garbage collected (or manually purged) even if the source object lifetime extends beyond the listeners.
trans-unit.target: 使用的中央事件调度<xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>可使的处理程序侦听器进行垃圾收集 （或手动清除） 即使源对象生存期超过了侦听器。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, a normal event hookup using `+=` or equivalent language-specific event syntax causes the potentially still-connected source to hold a strong reference to the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，常规事件挂钩使用`+=`或等效的特定于语言的事件语法会导致可能仍然连接的源保存到的处理程序的强引用。

trans-unit.source: This keeps the listener references from being garbage collected in a timely fashion.
trans-unit.target: 这将保持侦听器引用进行垃圾回收及时。

trans-unit.source: One common situation where the relationships between sources and listeners suggests the use of this pattern is the handling of update events coming from sources for data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 源和侦听器之间的关系中建议此模式的使用的一种常见情况是来自源的数据绑定的更新事件的处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the WeakEvent pattern to listen for events that are external to your application.
trans-unit.target: WeakEvent 模式可用于侦听外部的应用程序的事件。

trans-unit.source: You only need to define a <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> for it, provide listening behavior in <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A>, and use the <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> to attach the handler references rather than `+=`.
trans-unit.target: 只需定义<xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>，侦听在提供的行为<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A>，并使用<xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>将处理程序附加引用而非`+=`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 发出该事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Receives events from the centralized event manager.
trans-unit.target: 接收集中事件管理器中的事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the listener handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果侦听器已对事件进行了处理，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: It is considered an error by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> handling in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to register a listener for an event that the listener does not handle.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中，<see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 处理为侦听器未处理的事件注册侦听器被视为错误。

trans-unit.source: Regardless, the method should return <see langword="false" /> if it receives an event that it does not recognize or handle.
trans-unit.target: 无论如何，如果此方法接收到它未能识别或处理的事件，它都应该返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A> to provide WeakEvent pattern support for two hypothetical events `ClockwiseSpin` and `CounterclockwiseSpin` that each have a dedicated <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> (not shown).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener.ReceiveWeakEvent%2A>以提供针对两个假设事件 WeakEvent 模式支持`ClockwiseSpin`和`CounterclockwiseSpin`，每个包含专用<xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>（未显示）。

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls class handler stubs for each supported event, casting the event data (in this case the two events share an event data type `SpinEventArgs`).
trans-unit.target: 此实现中调用类处理程序存根 （stub） 为每个受支持的事件，将事件数据转换 (在这种情况下两个事件具有事件的数据类型`SpinEventArgs`)。

trans-unit.source: The implementation returns `false` if the event received is not one that is expected.
trans-unit.target: 实现返回`false`如果收到该事件不是一个预期。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to receive all possible events where the receiver is in a listener list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在接收所有可能的事件接收方所在侦听器列表中。

trans-unit.source: Particularly if implementing for a class that is listening for more than one event, you must check the type of the incoming <paramref name="managerType" /> parameter in order to know which event the call corresponds to.
trans-unit.target: 尤其是在实现侦听多个事件的类，必须检查传入的类型<paramref name="managerType" />才能知道哪个事件调用的参数对应于。

trans-unit.source: This is why each event that is to be part of the pattern must have a dedicated <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 这就是为什么要模式的一部分的每个事件必须有一个专用<see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <paramref name="e" /> parameter is typed as the general <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<paramref name="e" />参数被类型化为常规<see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in order get any specific properties out of the event data, your implementation will need to cast to the specific event data type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，按顺序将获得事件数据外的任何特定属性，您的实现需要强制转换为特定事件数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Typically, after checking for the identity of the event based on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> type, your implementation should call a private class handler.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，基于事件的标识检查后<see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" />类型，您的实现应调用私有类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Your class handler could conceivably be the very same class handler that is used to handle that event for listeners that are added through the conventional event pattern of adding via <see langword="+=" /> to the event on the sender.
trans-unit.target: 你的类处理程序可能是完全相同的类处理程序用于处理该事件的通过添加的常规事件模式通过添加的侦听器<see langword="+=" />到发件人上的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example section provides a rough implementation template.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例部分提供了一个大致的实现模板。
